name: Adam The Storyteller
description:
After waking up, Adam discovers himself flying up in the air on a piece of rock towards a mysterious floating island. Meet others sharing the same fate. What connects them all and what secrets mysterious island hides.

Adam The Storyteller is a difficult puzzle game. While the first levels are super easy to complete, further in the game it requires long-term planning of used puzzles. Every few levels new power-up puzzles are introduced along with new game mechanics to rise difficulty and challenge players. The game requires a lot of skills to collect all the secrets and beat all the high scores.

Features

  • 100 hand-crafted levels.
  • Intuitive gameplay. Easy to learn but hard to master!
  • Unique and innovative mechanics. Discover and master all the piece placement techniques.
  • Became the ultimate Storyteller!
